# Continuous Uniform

> Continuous uniform distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var uniform = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/uniform' );
```

#### uniform

Continuous uniform distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = uniform;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();

console.log( getKeys( uniform ) );
```
